SA15dhnyabpu:14: sarva eva hi viśiṣṭo janaḥ śāstrārambhe sveṣṭhadevatāstutiṃ kṛtavān /
SA15dhnyabpu:18: śrotṛṇāṃ stutipuraḥsarayā pravṛttyā puṇyātiśayotpādanāt pārārthya cālocya buddhasya bhagavataḥ stutimārabdhavān- jayantītyādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:19: anena ślokena buddhasya bhagavata eva pūjā stotrataḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:21: stotramapi sva- parārthasampattyai sambhāvtīti pūrva svārthasampada bhagavatī darsahyati jayanti jātivyasanetyādinā sugataparyantenaḥ manastamastānabetyādinā parārthasampadam /
SA15dhnyabpu:33: 'samyagjñānapūrvikā sarvapruṣārthasiddhiriti tadvayutpādayate' iti prathamavākyenāsya prakaraṇasya sambandha-prayojana-abhiveyāni,
SA15dhnyabpu:35: tathā hi sambandha prayojana abhidheyānāmabhāve prakaraṇaśāstrarmadaṃ prekṣāpūrva[dha] samyagjñānapūrviketyādinā asya prakaraṇasyābhidheya- prayojanamucyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:42: sa ādiryeṣāṃ dveṣādīnāṃ te rāgādayo bhavanti kleśāḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:72: tama iti kṛtvā na gamatayā tamo 'ndhakārī dhaṭādipratibandhaṃ karoti /
SA15dhnyabpu:76: ṣaṣṭhī- samāso vā vacana pramātho draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:77: manastamastānavamādadhānāḥ=tanutvaṃ kurvāṇāḥ sakalajanasya śruticintābhāvanākrameṇa sugatasya vācaḥ sutra abhidharma vinayasvabhāvāḥ jayanti /
SA15dhnyabpu:79: yasmād bhagavatpravacane pramāṇaparicinna upāyo vimukti lakṣaṇaśca upāyo nirdiśyate,
SA15dhnyabpu:80: teṣāṃ cāgama upāyopeyayoḥ pramāṇarahitatvāt tato bhagavata eva vāco jayanti,
SA15dhnyabpu:89: tatra tad vyutpādayate ityanena abhidheyaṃ prayojanaṃ ca sākṣādukte /
SA15dhnyabpu:91: etacca tatra sāmarthyam- samyagjñānapratipādanārtha prakaraṇārambhād arthād prakaraṇamupāya eveti darśitam anyathā yadi upāyo na syāt,
SA15dhnyabpu:96: tacca vyutpattayātmakaṃ samyagjñānapratipādanamanena kriyata iti prakaraṇamidaṃ tasyārthasya sādhanaṃ bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:102: sa ca sādhya sādhanalakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ kāryakāraṇalakṣaṇa eva /
SA15dhnyabpu:115: tatrāyaṃ vākyārthaḥ- yasmāt sarvapuruṣārtha dvividhaṃ hi prakaraṇaśarīram- śabdaḥ arthaśca /
SA15dhnyabpu:120: sarvapuruṣārthasiddhiḥ prayojanaṃ yena syāt prayojana prayojanam,
SA15dhnyabpu:121: tena ca prayojana prayojanamākhyātamiti dūṣitam sāmarthyāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:125: yato dvividhaṃ prakaraṇasya śarīraṃ prakaraṇasya svabhāvaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:145: iṣṭaśca prakaraṇārambhaḥ sautrāntikaḥ yogācārobhayanayānu abhidheyaṃ tu yadi nipprayojanaṃ syāt,
SA15dhnyabpu:147: yathā kākadantaprayojanābhāvāt na tatparīkṣā ārambhaṇīyā prekṣāvatā /
SA15dhnyabpu:151: atra ca prakaraṇābhidheyasya samaygjñānasya sarvapuruṣārthasiddhihetutvaṃ prayojanamuktam /
SA15dhnyabpu:153: tathā hi- 'puruṣārthopayogi samyagjñānaṃ vyutpādayitavyamanena prakaraṇena' iti bruvatā samyagjñānamaraya śabdasandarbhasya abhidheyam,
SA15dhnyabpu:160: ekaṃ tu vadat trayaṃ sākṣāt sāmarthyād darśayati /
SA15dhnyabpu:167: nanu ca yatrābhidheyaprayojanaṃ prekṣāvatāṃ pravṛttāvaṅga tathā samvandhādīnyapi,
SA15dhnyabpu:170: asminnabhidheyaprayojane kathite tānyapi sāmarthyāt kathitāni bhavantītyarhtaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:179: na caikena vākyenārthatrayaṃ sākṣāchakyate darśayitumiti darśayati- na tvidamityādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:180: ekaṃ tvittyādivākyaṃ prādhānyenaikaṃ vadadabhidheyavyutpattiprayojanasambandhārthatrayaṃ pratipadayati tatra tadityādinā /
SA15dhnyabpu:194: sarva iti sannikṛṣṭaviprakṛṣṭa laukika lokottara heyopādeyopekṣaṇīyāḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:202: strak candana vasanāśana tatra tad ityābhidheyam,
SA15dhnyabpu:206: tathā hi- sarve prekṣāvantaḥ pravṛttiprayojanamanviṣya pravartante /
SA15dhnyabpu:210: samyagjñānaṃ vyutpadyamānānāmātmānaṃ vyutpādakaṃ kartu prakaraṇamidaṃ kṛtam /
SA15dhnyabpu:211: śiṣyaiścācāryaprayuktāmātmano vyutpattimiccadbhiḥ prakaraṇamidaṃ śrūyata iti prakaraṇakaraṇa śravaṇayo prayojanaṃ vyutpādanam /
SA15dhnyabpu:214: vyutpattiḥ kriyata ityevaṃ yujyate vaktum kimiti atdvayutpādyate iti ṇicā nirdeśa iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:217: vakturiti śāstrakartu śrotuśca prakaraṇakaraṇaśravaṇavyāpārasya prayojanaṃ vintyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:218: yasmād dvayorapi vaktṛśrotrostatra prakaraṇe prakaraṇakaraṇaśravaṇāsyo vyāpārau staḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:222: yasmādanena samyagjñānaṃ vyutpādayate ityatra vākye vyutpattikriyāniṣpattau karaṇaśravaṇakriyādvayakartavyatayā praviṣṭam /
SA15dhnyabpu:223: tacca vyutpattikaraṇa śāstrakārasyaiva nānyasyeti ṇicā nidarśitam /
SA15dhnyabpu:224: yasmāt samyagjñānaṃ vyutpādyamānān śiṣyān prerayati- vyutpāditaṃ samyagjñānaṃ vyutpadyadhvam iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:229: tathāpi na tāni vyutpādakāniḥ teṣāṃ śiṣyaviṣaye prerakatvābhāvāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:231: yasmāchiṣyā ācāryaprayuktāṃ vyutpattimātmanaḥ sambandhinī kartumichanti yataste pracidyāḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:232: tasmāt tat prakaraṇaṃ taiḥ śrūyate iti śravaṇasya prayojanaṃ vyutpādanam /
SA15dhnyabpu:234: anyathā asādhāraṇavyāpāro vakturvyutpattau na darśitaḥ syāt,
SA15dhnyabpu:236: yasmāt sarva eva prayojakaparatantro pāna śayyāsanalakṣaṇaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:239: tathāhi- pratyakṣādijñānena virdhārya śūla viṣa kaṇṭha kādikaṃ pariharati puṣpamālyādikamādatte,
SA15dhnyabpu:241: prekṣāvatā hi samyagjñānavyutpādanāya prakaraṇamidamārabdhavatā ayamevipāyo nānya iti darśita evopāyopeyabhāvaḥ prakaraṇaprayojanayoḥ sambandha iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:242: nanu ca prakaraṇaśravaṇāt prāguktānyapi abhidheyādīni pramāṇābhāvāt prekṣāvadbhirna gṛhyante,
SA15dhnyabpu:244: satyam aśrute prakaraṇe kathitānyapi na niścauyante /
SA15dhnyabpu:252: svatantrāṇāṃ cācāryaprayukta vyutpattimaniccatāṃ śravaṇābhāvāt kathaṃ śravaṇavyāpārasya prayojanaṃ cintyate?- iti syitam /
SA15dhnyabpu:253: nanu ca yathābhidheyavyutpādanaprayojanayorapoddhāreṇa pratipādakapadaṃ kathaṃ sambandhasyāpi kimīt na kathitam?
SA15dhnyabpu:255: ayameva prakaraṇaviśeṣo laghūpāyatayā vakṣyamāṇaya nītyopāyaḥ vyutpādanam= upeyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:257: sa ca pratīyata iti na padāntareṇa kathitaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:261: evamādivākyenābhidheyaprayojanādau kathite sati prāmāṇikānāṃ prabṛttau tadasaṅgata emveti manyamānaścodayati- nanvityādinā /
SA15dhnyabpu:264: na cādivākye prayojanādinā kathitena śāstraśravaṇāt prāgvartate śāstram,
SA15dhnyabpu:274: yo hi samaygjñānārthī sa tathābhutaṃ śāstrakartu rādivākyaṃ śrutvātatra saṃśete,
SA15dhnyabpu:281: tena sarvapuruṣārthasiddhau niścitameva samyagjñānaṃ kāraṇaṃ bhavatīti pradarśitam /
SA15dhnyabpu:282: itiśabdaḥ vyākhyātaṇāṃ hi vacana krīḍādyarthamanyathāpi sambhāvyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:283: śastrakṛtāṃ tu prakaraṇaprārambhe na viparītabhidheyādyabhidhāne prayojanamutpaśyāmaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:293: etāsu cānarthasambhāvanāsu ekasyāmapyanarthasambhavanāyām na prekṣāvantaḥ pravartante /
SA15dhnyabpu:296: iti prekṣāvatāṃ pravṛttyaṅgamarthasambhāvanāṃ kartu sambandhādīnyabhidhīyanta iti sthitam /
SA15dhnyabpu:299: tena yaduktaṃ kenacid- 'vyākhyānakārā eva prayojanādīni pratipādayaisaynti' iti,
SA15dhnyabpu:301: utpaśyāma ityādinaitad darśayati- yadyapi pramāṇaṃ nāsti,
SA15dhnyabpu:303: nanu ca vādhakasādhakapramāṇābhāvāt samyagjñānavyutpattyarthī vināpi āvidacanena saṃśayānastatra pravartate- iti kimādivākyena tatroktena?
SA15dhnyabpu:311: kathite ca vacane śāstrakāreṇa tadanurodhād vacanādarthasaṃśayo jāyate,
SA15dhnyabpu:314: ato vā prakaraṇādanyasya prakaraṇasya laghutaropāyatāṃ sambhāvyāsya prakaraṇasyasāratayā anupāyatā syādityarthaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:315: evaṃ samudāyena vākyasya tātparya vyākhyāyāvayavārtha darśayitumāha- avisaṃvādakamityādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:316: 'avisaṃvādakaṃ jñānaṃ samyagjñānaṃ' iti bruvatā ṭīkākṛtā arthāvabodhakaṃ jñānaṃ mīmāṃsakaparikalpitam,
SA15dhnyabpu:318: athāpi viparītaṃ jñānaṃ kaiścit parikalpitaṃ samyaktvena,
SA15dhnyabpu:330: tathā hi- na jñānaṃ janayad artha prāpayati,
SA15dhnyabpu:333: na hi puruṣaṃ haṭhāt pravartayituṃ śaknoti vijñānam /
SA15dhnyabpu:337: tathā ca sati arthādhigamāt samāptaḥ pramāṇavyāpāraḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:342: tatreva ca arthe kimanyena jñānenādhikaṃ kāryam /
SA15dhnyabpu:344: tatra yo 'rtho dṛṣṭatvena jñāttaḥ sa pratyakṣeṇa pravṛttiviṣayīkṛtaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:346: tasya ekasminnevārthe trayāṇāṃ jñānātāṃ pradarśaka pravartaka prāpakabhedena prāmāṇyamiṣṭaṃ pareṇa,
SA15dhnyabpu:349: pradarśite cārthe prathamena darśakena jñānena yad dvitīyaṃ jñānaṃ tatraivārthe puruṣasya pravarttakam,
SA15dhnyabpu:356: yat pradarśakamādāvutpannamarthe jñānaṃ tadeva pravṛttiviṣayaṃ karoti,
SA15dhnyabpu:368: nanu ca yadyapyarthādhigatireva pramāṇaphalaṃ tathāpi yāvaduttare pravartaka-prāpakajñane na bhavataḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:370: evaṃ manyate- adhigate cārthe samāptaḥ pramāṇavyāpāra iti tayoḥ prāmāṇye karttavye 'nupayogitvam,
SA15dhnyabpu:375: sa ca niścayaḥ prathamayā cārthādhigatyā kṛta iti samāpto tadvayutpādyata iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:376: atra taditi samyagjñānaṃ yojanīyam napusaṃkaliṅgena svarupanirdeśāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:379: pradarśakaṃ pratyakṣam tasmād dṛṣṭatayā jñātaḥ pratyakṣadarśitaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:388: ābhyāṃ pramāṇābhyāmanyena ca jñānena darśito 'rthaḥ kaścid atyanta vipartyastaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:389: yathā- marīcikāsu jalamḥ sa cāsatvāt prāptumaśakyaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:392: na ca bhāvābhāvābhyāṃ yukto 'rtho jagatyastiḥ tataḥ prāptumaśakyastādṛśaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:399: evam sāmānyena saṃvādakaṃ samyagjñānaṃ pratipādya viśeṣeṇa ca pratyakṣānumāne svavyāpāraṃ kurvatī samyagjñāne bhavata iti darśayannāha- tatra yo 'rtha ityādinā /
SA15dhnyabpu:404: etaduktaṃ bhavati- pratibhāsamānārthavyavasāyaṃ kurvat pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ samvādakanityarthaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:407: tacca vahnayavyabhivāridhūmaniścayanaṃ sāmānyena sādhyābinābhāvi ca smaraṇajñānam /
SA15dhnyabpu:408: yathā dhūmaṃpratyakṣeṇa gṛhītvā sarvatra ayaṃ vahnijaḥ iti smaraṇam /
SA15dhnyabpu:411: yathā atratyo dhūmo vahnijaḥ iti jānam /
SA15dhnyabpu:413: anumānasya tuliṅgadarśanāt svaviṣaye niścayātmanotpattireva niścayavyāpāra iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:414: tathā ce yādinā anayordaśitaṃ vyāpāraṃ spaṣṭayati /
SA15dhnyabpu:415: ata ete pramāṇe nānyadvijñānam ityevaṃ bruvatā ete eva samyagjñāne nānyāni śabdādīni /
SA15dhnyabpu:420: etaduktaṃ bhavati- yathā pratyakṣānumāne svenasvena pramāṇenopadarśitārthasya prāpake,
SA15dhnyabpu:422: sarveṇa cāliṅgajena vikalpena vinyāmakamadṛṣṭvā pravṛttena bhavābhāvayo raniyata evārtho darśayitavyaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:425: bhāvābhāvāniyataṃ cārtha darśa yat apramāṇam anyad vijñānam /
SA15dhnyabpu:436: yasmādanyākāravadvastugrāhi nākārāntaravati vastuni pramāṇam yathā prītaśaṅkhagrāhi śukle śaṅkha /
SA15dhnyabpu:437: deśāntarasthagrāhi ca na deśāntarasthe pramāṇam yathā- kuñcikāvivaradiśasthāyāṃ maṇiprabhāyāṃ maṇigrāhi jñānaṃ nāpavarakasye maṇau /
SA15dhnyabpu:438: kālāntarayyuktagrāhi ca na kālāntaravarti vastuni pramāṇam yathā ardharātre madhyāhnakālavastugrāhi svapnajñānaṃ ardharātrakāle vastuni pramāṇam /
SA15dhnyabpu:439: nanu ca mā bhūt saṃśaryāvaparyajñanayoḥ prāmāṇyam,
SA15dhnyabpu:440: tathābhūtasyārthasyāsattvāditiḥ yat punaḥ iha kūpe jalam iti jñānaṃ tat pramāṇāntaraṃ kimiti na bhavati?
SA15dhnyabpu:447: evaṃ manyate- yadayapi sākṣāt saṃśayajñānaṃ na pratīyate,
SA15dhnyabpu:448: yastu saṃśayavikalpakasya jñānasya iha kūpe jalam ityevañjātīyasyaḥ tathāpi niyāmakaṃ liṅgamantareṇa tadapramāṇam,
SA15dhnyabpu:450: tataścāyamarthaḥ- syāt kadācit kūpe jalam iti taccaivaṃ svarūpam,
SA15dhnyabpu:452: yat punastatra pravṛttena kadācijjalaṃ labhayate tajjñānāntarāditi viniścayaṭīkāyāṃ pratipāditam /
SA15dhnyabpu:453: nanu ca yadayapi saṃśayādīnāmupadarśitasyārthasya prāpakatvaṃ nāsti,
SA15dhnyabpu:462: ākāraniyataṃ ca prāpayitu śakyam yatkālaṃ tu pariccinnaṃ tatkālaṃ na śakyaṃ prāpayitum?
SA15dhnyabpu:463: nocyate- yasminneva kāle pariccidayate tasminneva kāle prāpayitavyamiti,
SA15dhnyabpu:466: kintu yatkālaṃ pariccinnaṃ tadeva tena prāpaṇīyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:470: kāraṇaśabdopādāne tu pruṣārthasiddhaḥ sākṣāt kāraṇaṃ gamyeta /
SA15dhnyabpu:484: evaṃ manyate- ebhirupadarśitasyārthasya pītākārasya kuñjikāvivarasthasya maṇairniyatadeśasya,
SA15dhnyabpu:492: evaṃ manyate codakaḥ- deśākrābhyāṃ niyatasya prāptuṃ śakyatvāda bhavatvanyākārasyānyadeśasya ca prāptāvapramāṇam,
SA15dhnyabpu:495: tataśca yathā satyanīle nīlajñānasyānyo grāhyakālo 'nyaśca prāpyakālaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:498: nocyate ityādinā siddhāntavādī tvevaṃ manyate- satyaṃ kṣaṇabhedena vastuno bhedo 'styevaḥ kintu kṣaṇāpekṣayā na prāmānyalakṣaṇamucyate,
SA15dhnyabpu:500: tataśca nīlādo ya eva santānaḥ pariccinno nīlajñānena,
SA15dhnyabpu:503: na tathā sthūlakālabhedena pradarśitasya putrasya svaptnajñānam /
SA15dhnyabpu:515: kima arthakriyānirbhāsaṃ tu yadyapi sākṣātprāptiḥ tathāpi tanna parīkṣyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:518: arthakriyānirbhāse ca jñāte sati siddhaḥ puruṣārthaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:521: tasmāt parīkṣārhamasākṣāt kāraṇaṃ samyagjñānamādarśayituṃ kāraṇaśabdaṃ parityajya pūrvagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam /
SA15dhnyabpu:529: upekṣaṇīyo hyanupādeyatvād heya nantakāraṇaṃ jñānaṃ bhavati,
SA15dhnyabpu:542: tat prāpitaheyopādayānuṣṭhāan vyavhārāpekṣayā pravartakamiti vyavahitaṃ sādhananirbhāsajñānam /
SA15dhnyabpu:548: tayoranubhave sati sādhanajñānāt pravatituṃ vā yujyata iti na praikṣārham /
SA15dhnyabpu:555: tena hya vaṃ vyākayātam arthaśabdena prayojanamucyate,
SA15dhnyabpu:558: taccāyuktam yasmādarthasya dārupākāderna samyagjñānānniṣpattiḥ, kiṃ tarhi?
SA15dhnyabpu:559: svahetoreva vahnayādeḥ dharmottaravyākhyāne tu heyopādeyārthaviṣayā yā siddhiḥ= anuṣṭhitiḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:561: amumevārtha darśayiṣyati heyasya ca hānamanuṣthānam iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:575: api tvayamarthaḥ- yā kācit siddhiḥ sā sarvā kṛtsnaivāsau samyagjñānanibandhaneti /
SA15dhnyabpu:580: pradarśitaṃ cāprāpayat miethyajñānam aprāpakaṃ ca kathamarthasiddhinibandhanaṃ syāt tasmād yanmithyājñānaṃ na tato 'rthasiddhiḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:582: ata eva samyagjñānaṃ yatnato vyutpādanīyam yatastadeva puruṣārthasiddhinibandhanam /
SA15dhnyabpu:583: tato yāvadū brūyāta-yā kācit puruṣārthasiddhiḥ sā samyagjñānanibandhanaiveti,
SA15dhnyabpu:586: tadayamarthaḥ- yasmāt samyagityāha- na ca heyetyādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:589: tena yaduktaṃ kaiścit- heyopādeyayoḥ puruṣārthopayogitvāt kathanam,
SA15dhnyabpu:611: tato yāvad brūyādityādinopasaṃhāravyājenevaśabdena prayuktenāvadhāraṇārthavācinā yāvānarthastāvāneva sarvaśabdena prayuktena kṛtsnārthavācinā bhavatīti darśayati /
SA15dhnyabpu:624: jñānapūrvikā sarvapuruṣārthasiddhiḥ tasmāt tat samyagjñānaṃ vyupādayate /
SA15dhnyabpu:630: caturvidhā cātra vipratipattiḥ saṃkhyā lakṣaṇa gocara phalaviṣayā /
SA15dhnyabpu:635: tasyāḥ prādhānyāt taccabdena sambandho yukto na samyagjñanasya?
SA15dhnyabpu:637: evaṃ manyate- śabdārthī hi dvividhaḥ śābdaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:655: evaṃ manyate- vipratipattinirākaraṇadvāreṇa samyagjñānasvarūpaṃ jñāpyate 'nena prakaraṇeneti // 1 //
SA15dhnyabpu:672: tasmāt tādṛśavipratipatticatuṣṭhayanirākaraṇena srvathā abhāntatayā samyagjñanasvarūpaṃ pratipāditaṃ bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:673: tatra ca prathamameva saṅkhayāvipratipattinirākaraṇārthamuktam- dvividhaṃ samyagjñānamiti /
SA15dhnyabpu:679: vyaktibhede ca pradarśite prativyaktiniyataṃ samyagjñānalakṣaṇamākhyātuṃ śakyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:680: apradarśite tu vyaktibhede sakalavyaktyanuyāyi samyagjñānalakṣaṇamekaṃ na śakyaṃ vaktum /
SA15dhnyabpu:682: apradarśite tu vyaktibhedātmake saṃkhyāhede lakṣaṇabhedasya darśayitumaśakyatvāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:688: prāptāpannālaṅgatisamāseṣu paravalliṅgapratiṣedhāt abhidheyavalliṅge sati sarvaliṅgaḥ pratyakṣaśabdaḥ siddhaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:689: nanu ca samyagjñānasya lakṣaṇe kathite sati paścāt tadbhedaḥ pradarśayitu yujyate- ityambhutalakṣaṇaṃ samyagjñānaṃ dvividhamiti,
SA15dhnyabpu:693: kintvatra saṃkhyābhede 'kathite samyagjñānasya lakṣaṇameva na śakyate kathayitum,
SA15dhnyabpu:694: ataḥ pratyakṣasyānyallakṣaṇaṃ pratiniyataṃ śakyate kathayitumityato lakṣaṇāṅgamevādau saṃkhyābhedakathanamiti /
SA15dhnyabpu:695: nanu ca pratyakṣamanumānaṃ ca iti nirdeśād dvividhamiti labdham,
SA15dhnyabpu:699: asati dvitvakathane pratyakṣānumāne tāvat sambhavati'nyānyapi pramāṇāni bhaviṣyantīti syādāśaṅkā // 2 //
SA15dhnyabpu:714: tathātrāpi indriyāśritatvena jñānaviṣayasya pratyakṣakārakatvasūcanāt pratyakṣacatuṣṭhayameva pratyakṣatvenāśrīyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:723: tadeva śabdasya pravṛttinimittam tataścayatkiñcidarśasya sākṣātkāri jñānaṃ tat pratyakṣamucyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:727: yathā gaccatoti gauḥ iti gamanakriyāyāṃ vyutpādito 'pi gośabdo gamanakriyopalakṣitamekārthasamavetaṃ gotvaṃpravṛttinimittī karoti /
SA15dhnyabpu:728: yathā ca gaccatyagaccati ca gavi gośabdaḥ siddho bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:733: smṛte ca sādhyasādhanasambandhe 'numānaṃ pravartate iti paścātkālabhāvi ucyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:736: pratyakṣo ghaṭaiti na syātḥ idameva syātpratyakṣājñānam,
SA15dhnyabpu:739: nanu ca pratigatamakṣamityasyāṃ vyutpattāvakṣāśritasyaividnriyajñanasya pratyakṣaśabdavācyatā syāt,
SA15dhnyabpu:747: apapi paścānmānamanumānamityavyayībhāvasamāse pūrvaccodayamudbhāvya gatisamāsa āśrayitavyaḥ- anugataṃ mānamanumānamiti /
SA15dhnyabpu:756: yathā pratyakṣāmarthenotpannaṃ sad abhrāntamiti pramāṇaṃ bhavativ tathānumānamapi tādātmyadutpattibhyāmarthapratibandhādabhrāntamiti tat pramāṇaṃ bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:757: etena yaduvata kaiścit- sarveṣu pramāṇeṣu mukhyaṃ pratyakṣam iti tannirastam /
SA15dhnyabpu:764: tena kalpanāpoḍhamabhrāntaṃ yad bhavati tadeva pratyakṣaṃ viditavyam ityartha ukto bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:769: tato 'yaṃ vākyārthaḥ- tatra tayoḥ pratyakṣānumānayoriti samudāyanirdeśaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:771: cakāraḥ pratyakṣānumānayostulyavalatvaṃ samuccinotītyādinā yaduvataṃ śabarasvāmiprabhṛtibhiḥ- pratyakṣaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ nānumānam,
SA15dhnyabpu:772: tathā coktaṃ mīsāṃsābhāsye- pratyakṣe valīyasi kathamanumānam iti tat prayuktam yato dvayorapi svavyāpāre tulyabalatbam /
SA15dhnyabpu:775: tābhyāmevaṃ vyākhyātam- pratyakṣamanumānaṃ ca iti bhinnavibhaktinirdeśo 'rthād viṣayabhedaṃ darśayati /
SA15dhnyabpu:778: etaccāyuktam yasmād ekavibhaktinirdeśe kriyamāṇe cakāreṇa tulyabalatvaṃ na pradarśitaṃ syāditi // 3 //
SA15dhnyabpu:783: anena lakṣyalakṣaṇabhāvaṃ darśayatā vinītadevavyākhyānaṃ saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandharūpaṃ pratyuktam /
SA15dhnyabpu:786: yadayapyanvarthasaṃjñayā kalpanāpoḍhaṃ yadbhrāntaṃ ca tatpratyakṣamiti śakyate yathārtha kathayitum,
SA15dhnyabpu:787: tathāpi na svarūpaṃ pratyakṣasya kathitaṃ syat,
SA15dhnyabpu:788: yato 'nyadapi pratyakṣasya svarūpamartha avayavārthastu- kalpanābhya apoḍhamiti kalpanāpoḍham /
SA15dhnyabpu:801: yat tad bhavatām asmākaṃ cārtheṣu sākṣātkāri jñāni prasiddham,
SA15dhnyabpu:804: kimanyat pratyakṣasya jñānasya rūpamavaśiṣyate yat pratyakṣaśabdavācyaṃ sad anūdyeteti,
SA15dhnyabpu:805: yasmādindriyānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyyartheṣu sākṣātkāri jñānaṃ pratyakṣaśabda vācyaṃ sarveṣāṃ prasiddham,
SA15dhnyabpu:808: lakṣyalakṣaṇetukathite yathārtha kathitaṃ bhavati yat kiñcit pratyakṣaṃ tat kalpanāpoḍhābhrāntamiti pratipattavyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:812: na cānityatvaṃ saṃjñeti gamyata iti saṃjñā lakṣaṇakaraṇayorbhedaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:814: tenāpyatra lakṣyalakṣaṇabhāvo viparītamākhyātaṃ bhaṅgayāḥ yato lakṣaṇavidhānakāle lakṣyamanūdaya lakṣaṇavidhīyate,
SA15dhnyabpu:816: siddhe tu lakṣyalakṣaṇabhāve sati lakṣaṇasanūdaya lakṣyaṃ vidhīyate,
SA15dhnyabpu:817: aythā- yaḥ śikhāvān sa parivrājakaḥ iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:819: viparītavidhānamityanyadapi asminmate dūṣaṇaṃ dattvaṃ viniścayaṭīkāyā ṭīkākṛtteti tatraiva draṣṭavyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:820: nanu ca lakṣaṇavidhipakṣe pratyakṣasyādyāpyasiddhatvādanūdyaṃ na sambhavati,
SA15dhnyabpu:822: aythā- śikhayā parivrājakaḥ ityatra śikhālakṣaṇamanūdya kalpanāpoḍhādi vidhīyate?
SA15dhnyabpu:824: evaṃ manyate- yadyapi kalpanāpoḍhatvena pratyakṣaṃ na siddham,
SA15dhnyabpu:834: yogācārā hi sarvamālambanajñānaṃ bhrāntaṃ kalpanāyāḥ apoḍham apeta kalpanāpoḍham /
SA15dhnyabpu:841: tatrāsati abhrāntagrahaṇe gaccadvṛkṣadarśanādi pratyakṣaṃ kalpanāpoḍhatvāt syāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:842: tato hi pravṛttena vṛkṣamātramavāpyate iti saṃvādakatvāt samyagjñānam,
SA15dhnyabpu:848: abhrāntamarthakriyākṣame ca vasturūpa ityādināvisaṃvādo 'rtho 'bhrāntaśabdasya na sambhavatīti darśayati /
SA15dhnyabpu:850: sanniveśopādhivarṇātmakamityanenaitad darśayati- varṇādanyat saṃsyānādikaṃ paraparikalpitaṃ nāstīti /
SA15dhnyabpu:851: etacca lakṣaṇadvayamityādinā padadvayena vipratipattinirāsaṃ darśayatā vinītadevavyakhyā padadvayavyavacedakathanarūpā dūṣitā /
SA15dhnyabpu:852: tena tvevaṃ vyākhyātam- abhrāntamiti yad visaṃvādi na bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:853: evaṃ satyanumāsyāpi pratyakṣalakṣaṇaṃ prāpnotīti kalpanāpoḍhagrahaṇaṃ tannivṛttyartham /
SA15dhnyabpu:855: ālambane yanna bhrāntaṃ tadabhrāntam ityevamucyamāne sarva pratyakṣaṃ jñānamālambane bhrāntamiti na kasyacit pratyakṣatvaṃ syāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:856: tathā cāha- sarvamālambane bhrāntaṃ muktvā tathāgatajñānam,
SA15dhnyabpu:861: nanu ca bhavataḥ pakṣe 'pi kimiti vyavaccedārtha na bhavati?
SA15dhnyabpu:864: api tvarthakriyākṣame vasturūpa ālamabane yanna bhrāmyati tadabhrāntaśabdena gṛhyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:867: yogācāramatena tvabhrāntagrahaṇaṃ na kartavyamḥ saṃvādakasya samyagjñānasya prastutatvāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:883: tato yaddeśo gaccad vṛkṣo dṛṣṭaḥ taddeśo nāvāpyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:884: yaddeśaścāvāpyate sa na dṛṣṭa iti tasmāt kaścidartho 'vāpyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:888: tathā hi momāṃsakādaya evamāhuḥ yathā nirvikalpakaṃ jñānaṃ samyagjñānaṃ tathā jātyādiyojanājñānamapi samyagjñānamindriyajamḥ upadarśitasyārthasya prāpaṇāt / tathā cāha-
SA15dhnyabpu:893: na prakāśaḥ prakāśena sā hi pratyavamaśinī //
SA15dhnyabpu:894: na so 'sti pratyayo loke yaḥ śabdānugamadṛte /
SA15dhnyabpu:896: tathā naiyāyikādīnāṃ savikalpakaṃ pratyakṣamiti kalpanāpoḍhagrahaṇena nirākriyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:897: tathā kalpanāpoḍhagrahaṇena nirvikalpe siddhe 'grahaṇamatiricyamāna dvicandrajñānādeḥsamyagjñānādhikaraṇa eva nirastatvād vipratipattinirāsārthatvameva bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:899: gaccadvṛkṣadarśanajñānaṃ cālātacakrajñānamabhrāntamapi samyagjñānamiccantiḥ vastuno 'bhrāntatvāt pītākārādeśca bhrāntatvāda- ityasti vipratipatti,
SA15dhnyabpu:901: tathā sati abhrāntagrahaṇa ityādinābhrāntaviṣayasya vipratipattiviṣayaṃ darśayati /
SA15dhnyabpu:913: abhilapyate 'neneti abhilāpaḥ=vācyaḥ tathā abhrāntagrahaṇenāpyanumāne nivartite kalpanāpoḍhagrahaṇaṃ vipratipattinirākaraṇārtham /
SA15dhnyabpu:915: pratyakṣaṃ tu grāhya rūpe na viparyastam /
SA15dhnyabpu:916: na tvavisaṃvādakamabhrāntimiha grahītavyam yataḥ samyagjñānameva pratyakṣam, nānyat /
SA15dhnyabpu:918: evaṃ hi vākyārthaḥ syāt- pratyakṣākhyaṃ yadavisaṃvādakaṃ jñānaṃ tat kalpanāpoḍhamavisaṃvādakaṃ ceti /
SA15dhnyabpu:920: tasmād grāhya'rthakriyākṣame vasturūpe yadaviparyastaṃ tadabhrāntamiha veditavyam / // 4 //
SA15dhnyabpu:925: abhilāpena saṃsargaḥ abhilāpasaṃsargaḥ= ekasmin jñāne 'bhidheyākārasyābhidhānākāreṇa saha ghrāhyākāratayā milanam /
SA15dhnyabpu:926: tato yadaikasmin jñāne 'bhidheyābhidhānayorākārau sanniviṣṭau bhavataḥ tadā tathā bhrāntagrahaṇenetyādinā kalpanāpoḍhagrahaṇadya vipratipattinirāsārthatvaṃ darśayati /
SA15dhnyabpu:929: tasyārthasma grahaṇe doṣaṃ darśayati- na tvavisaṃvādakamityādinā // 4 //
SA15dhnyabpu:930: kīdṛśī punaḥ kalpanetyādinā kalpanābahutvāt kasyāḥ kalpanāyā grahaṇamiti kalpanāviśeṣamajānan pṛccati /
SA15dhnyabpu:931: tathā hi- vaibhāṣikā indriyavijñānaṃ vitarka vicāra caitasikasamprayuktaṃ kalpanāmiccanti /
SA15dhnyabpu:932: yogācāramatena ca tathāgatajñānamadvayaṃ muktvā sarvajñānaṃ grahyagrāhakatvena vikalpitaṃ kalpanā /
SA15dhnyabpu:934: abhilāpetyādinā śabdasaṃsṛṣṭasya vikalpasya grahaṇaṃ nāgamaparipaṭhitānāmiti darśayati /
SA15dhnyabpu:942: tadeva hi anvayavyatirekavattvād vyāptatvād abhilāpayituṃ śakyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:944: abhilāpasaṃsargasya yogyo 'bhidheyākārābhāso yasyāṃ pratītau sā tathoktā /
SA15dhnyabpu:946: yathā- vyutpanna saṃketasya ghaṭārthakalpanā ghaṭaśabdasaṃsṛṣṭārthāvabhāsā bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:947: kācittu abhilāpenāsaṃsṛṣṭāpi abhilāpasaṃsargayogyābhāsā bhavatiḥ yathā- bālakasyāvyutpannasaṃketasya kalpanā /
SA15dhnyabpu:948: tatra abhilāpasaṃsṛṣṭābhāsā kalpanā ityuktāvavyutpannasaṃketasya kalpanā na saṃgṛhyeta /
SA15dhnyabpu:950: yadayapi abhilāpasaṃsṛṣṭābhāsā na bhavati tadaharjātasya bālakasya kalpanā,
SA15dhnyabpu:954: sāmānyadi tena vinītadevavyākhyā dūṣitā- abhilapyata ityabhilāpaḥ= vācyaḥ sāmānyādiḥ ityevaṃrūpā /
SA15dhnyabpu:956: anyathā yogyagrahaṇena śabdasaṃsargayogyo na kathitaḥ syāditi /
SA15dhnyabpu:957: yadayevam, dharmottaravyākhyāne jātyādervācakasya saṃsargabhāvo na pradarśitaḥ syāt?
SA15dhnyabpu:959: viṣayacintāyāṃ sāmānyādeviṣayabhāvakathanena sāmarthyāt kathitaṃ bhavatīti nirodhaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:961: nanu ca yadayapi tasmin jñāne ākārayormīlanaṃ tathapi śabdārthayoḥ saṃsargo nāsti?
SA15dhnyabpu:964: tatra kācit pratītirityādinā yogyagrahaṇasya viṣayaṃ darśayati /
SA15dhnyabpu:966: nanu cāvyutpannasaṃketasya bālamūkāderanumato vijñāne na śabdasaṃsarga iti tadayogyatvamapi nāsti /
SA15dhnyabpu:969: mūkādijñāne tu saṃketābhāve sati śabdaratibhāso 'pi na sambhavatīti sasargayogyatvamapi nāsti /
SA15dhnyabpu:980: yadvā- na abhilapyate iti abhilāpaḥ= abhidherya yadarthasāmānyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:986: jñāne 'bhilāpasaṃsargayogyo yaḥ pratibhāsaḥ sa evābhilāpa asatyabhilāpasaṃsarge kuto yogyatāvasitiḥ?
SA15dhnyabpu:989: grahyo hyartho vijñānaṃ janayan niyatapratibhāsaṃ kuryāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:995: bālo 'pi hi yāvad dṛśyamānaṃ stanaṃ sa evāyam iti pūrvaduṣṭatvena na pratyavamṛśati tāvannoparatarudito mukhamarpayati stane /
SA15dhnyabpu:1001: tataśca vyāavarttyābhavāda yogyagrahaṇaṃ na kartavyamityāśaṅkāṃ parasya darśayati asatyabhilāpetyādinā /
SA15dhnyabpu:1014: tathā niyatapratibhāsaṃ vikalpajñānaṃ bālamūkāderapyastīti darśayati- bālo 'pi hītyādinā /
SA15dhnyabpu:1015: nanu ca bālasya tālvādikaraṇapāṭavābhāve sāmānyaviśeṣaśabdoccāraṇaṃ nāsti,
SA15dhnyabpu:1017: satyaṃ nāstiḥ kintu sa evāyam ityenena vikalpasyāvasthocyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:1020: etad darśayati- bālasyāpi pūrvaparaparāmarśarūpaṃ vikalpakaṃ vijñānamasti,
SA15dhnyabpu:1025: evaṃ śleṣeṇa vākyasya vyākhyānena ubhayorapi tadvikalpākāraḥ abhilāpasaṃsargayogyapratibhāsa ityuktaṃ veditavyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:1030: yadayapi hi svalakṣaṇameva vācyaṃ vācakaṃ ca bhavet,
SA15dhnyabpu:1032: na cendriyavijñānam arthena niyamitapratibhāsatvāt abhilāpasaṃsargayogyapratibhāsaṃ bhavatīti nirvikalpakam /
SA15dhnyabpu:1034: śabdasvalakṣaṇaṃ ca kiñcit vācyaṃ kiñcid vācakam- ityabhilākasaṃsargayogyapratibhāsaṃ syāt,
SA15dhnyabpu:1036: ropitatvāditi saṃsagaṃyogyaṃ bālamūkādervijñānamiti tannivṛttyarthaṃ yogyagrahaṇaṃ kartavyamiti sthitam /
SA15dhnyabpu:1037: indriyavijñānamityādinā kumarilena yadindriyavijñānasyālocanākhyasya bālamūkādivijñānena sādṛśyaṃ pratipāditam,
SA15dhnyabpu:1038: tad dūṣayitumukasṃhāravyājena vailakṣaṇyaṃ darśayati ata evetvādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:1040: ata eva svalakṣaṇasyāpi śabdasyārthasya ca vācya vācakatvamamyupagamya nirvikalpakatvamindriyavijñānasya sādhyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:1041: vikalpavijñānasya tu svalakṣaṇavācya vācakatvaṃ pratibhāsino 'pi savikalpakatvamiti sthitam /
SA15dhnyabpu:1045: kutaḥ? sāmānyayorviṣayacintāyāmeva nirasyamānatvāditi nirvikalpakatvakathanaṃ vyartha syādiha /
SA15dhnyabpu:1047: tena yad vinītadevena sāmānyayorvācyavācakabhāvamaṅgīkṛtya nirvikalpakatvamindriyāvijñānasya pratipāditam,
SA15dhnyabpu:1054: tadā kiñcid vācyaṃ śabdasvalakṣaṇaṃ kiñcid vācakaṃ śabdasvalakṣaṇa
SA15dhnyabpu:1060: tena etaduktyā śabdārthasāmānyākārarahitāyā pratītiḥ sā eva pratītiḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:1067: satyapi svalakṣaṇasya vācyavācakabhāve saṃketakāladṛṣṭatvena gṛhyamāṇaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ vācyaṃ vācakaṃ ca gṛhītaṃ syāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:1068: na ca saṃketakālabhāvi darśanaviṣayatvaṃ vastunaḥ saṃpratyamti /
SA15dhnyabpu:1073: tayeti / tayā kalpanayā kalpanāsvabhāvena rahitaṃ śūnyaṃ sahjñānaṃ yadabhrāntaṃ tat pratyakṣam iti pareṇa sambandhaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:1075: tataḥ śuddhayoḥ śravaṇe sati śabdavijñāne dvayorapi śabdayoḥ pratibhāsanāccotrendriyajñānamaniyatapratibhāsitvāt savikalpakaṃ syādityākūtam /
SA15dhnyabpu:1078: tathāpi śrotravijñāne na vācyavācakatayā tayoḥ pratibhāsanam,
SA15dhnyabpu:1083: tāvat kuto vācyatvaṃ vācakatvaṃ vā syāt,
SA15dhnyabpu:1084: etatpratyabhijñayā sa evāyaṃ vācako bhaviṣyatotyāha na ca saṃketakāletyādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:1088: yaśca pūrva jñānena viṣayīkṛtaḥ sa idānī nāsti,
SA15dhnyabpu:1091: yogijñānena yadyekasmin kāle manovijñānena ca yugapaccabdāthau gṛhyate,
SA15dhnyabpu:1092: tathāpi sannihitavastutayā tena gṛhītavyāviti darśayati- yogijñānamityādinā // /5 //
SA15dhnyabpu:1097: timiraṃ ca āśubhramaṇaṃ ca nauyānaṃ ca saṃkṣobhaśceti te ādayo yeṣāṃ te timirāśubhramaṇanauyānasaṃkṣobhādayaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:1106: na pratyekam- iti darśayituṃ tayā rahitaṃ yadabhrāntaṃ tat pratyakṣamiti lakṣaṇayoḥ parasparasāpekṣayoḥ pratyakṣaviṣayatvaṃ darśitamiti /
SA15dhnyabpu:1114: gaccantyāṃ nāvi sthitasya gaccadvṛkṣādibhrāntirutpadyate iti yaunagrahaṇam /
SA15dhnyabpu:1119: sarvareva ca vibhramakāraṇairindriyaviṣayabāhyādhyātmikāśrayagatairindriya- manyate-dharmiṇā kalpanājñānena dharmo 'tra kalpanātvaṃ lakṣyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:1120: yathā viṣāṇītyava viṣāṇitvamḥ tataśca kalpanātvena rahitaṃ yajjñānaṃ tannirvikalpakam /
SA15dhnyabpu:1123: na svātantryeṇa pṛthaglakṣaṇatvamiti darśayitumante pratyakṣaśabdaṃ gṛhītvā tayorapi sambadhnāti-tatpratyakṣamiti pareṇa sambandha ityanena /
SA15dhnyabpu:1134: bāhyā nauḥ saivāśrayastatra sthitasyāśrayadvārako vibhrama uccate /
SA15dhnyabpu:1136: nanu cendriyagatameva vibhramakāraṇam pratyucyateḥ nānyairindriyagatairindriyaṃ bikriyāṃ gatam?
SA15dhnyabpu:1148: yathā avatsā gaurānīyatām ityanena kācit aśvā nānīyate ghenurevā noyate tasyā eva vatsambandhadarśanāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:1156: pravibhāgo 'yaṃ viprati- meva vikartavyam avikṛte indriye indriyabhrāntyayogāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:1157: ete sṃkṣobhaparyantā ādayo yeṣāṃ te tathoktāḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:1163: tairanāhito vibhrabho yasmistat tathāvidhaṃ jñānaṃ pratyakṣam // 6 //
SA15dhnyabpu:1166: viniścaro tu saṃkṣobhaśabdena ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaṃ kṛtvādiśabdena bahubrīhisamāsaṃ darśayataḥ ko 'bhirpāyaṣṭhīkākṛta iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:1169: yadā saṃkṣobhaśabdena ṣaṣṭhīsamāsastadāśrayagatasya vibhramakāraṇasya upalakṣaṇatvād vātapittādergrahaṇaṃ bhavatīti nārthabhedaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:1173: ucyateḥ, asatyāśubhramaṇādigrahaṇe indriyagatamevādiśabdena kācakāmalādi gṛhyata ityāśaṃkyeta /
SA15dhnyabpu:1179: tata ubhayopādāne sati timirādīmybhayakātsnrya labhyata iti sthitam /
SA15dhnyabpu:1180: tat tathāvidhaṃ jñānamiti yadayapi sūtre jñānagrahaṇaṃ nāsti,
SA15dhnyabpu:1181: tathāpi bhrānte jñānadharmatvād tadvayudāsena jñānameva pratyakṣaṃ gṛhyata ityadoṣaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:1182: vinītadevavyākhyāyāṃ bhavati tu pratykṣasūtresyārthakathanaṃ jñānaṃ pratykṣamiti,
SA15dhnyabpu:1185: vaibhāṣikaiḥ- cakṣuḥ paśyati rūpāṇi iti atiriṣyate/
SA15dhnyabpu:1186: mānase ca pratyakṣe doṣa udbhāvita iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:1188: rūpaṃ dṛśyate cakṣurvijñānena tadākṛṣṭena manovijñānena iti,
SA15dhnyabpu:1203: manastu indriyaṃ naḥ mānasapratyakṣasya pṛthaṅ nirdeśāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:1204: tasmāt cakṣurādīndriyeṣu āśritaṃ jñānameva indriyajanya pratyakṣam // 8 //
SA15dhnyabpu:1208: teṣāṃ vipratipattinirākaraṇārtha pratyakṣasya prakārabhedaṃ darśayannāha- taccaturvidhamiti // 7 //
SA15dhnyabpu:1214: tanmanojñānaṃ yadīndriyavijñānaviṣaye pravatate tadā gṛhītagrāhitayā pramāṇam athānyaviṣaya pravartate,
SA15dhnyabpu:1215: vyavahite pratyakṣaṃ bhavat ki tanmanovijñānamindriyasavyapekṣaṃ syāt?
SA15dhnyabpu:1218: nirapekṣatve vānindrisyāpi manovijñānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ syādityandhavadhirādyabhāvacodayaṃ kṛtam /
SA15dhnyabpu:1224: mīmāṃsakādaya evamāhuḥ- yogina eva na santi samprati pramāṇābhāvāt,
SA15dhnyabpu:1230: indriyāśritaṃ vijñānaṃ pratyakṣam iti bruvatā vārttikakṛtā na cakṣuḥ pramāṇam iti kathitaṃ bhavati yasmājjñānasyaivānvayavyatirekānuvidhānād rūpādidarśane sāmarthyam,
SA15dhnyabpu:1244: sa sahakāriī yasya indriyajñānasya taqt svaviṣayānantaraviṣayasahakāri indriyajñānam /
SA15dhnyabpu:1245: samanantarapratyayabhūtena indriyajñānena janitaṃ yat tadeva manomātrāśrayatvānmānasaṃ pratyakṣamiti /
SA15dhnyabpu:1248: sva ātmīyo viṣaya indriyajñānasya tasya anantaraḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:1251: tataścāntare pratiṣiddhe samānajātīyo dvitīyakṣaṇabhavyupadeyakṣaṇa indriyavijñānaviṣayasya gṛhyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:1256: iha ca kṣaṇike vastuni atiśayādhānāyogādekakāyakāritvena sahakārī gṛhyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:1261: tasyanantara ityasya vivaraṇam- na vidayata ityādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:1280: smantara iti ca bhavati śakan'vādiṣu pāṭhāt ṣararūpatvam,
SA15dhnyabpu:1281: yataḥ sa ceti iha svaviṣayānantaraviṣaya it kathanaṃ gṛhītagrahaṇādavabodhakaṃ na bhavatīti doṣam,
SA15dhnyabpu:1291: tadanenaikasantānāntarbhūtayoreva indriyajñāna manovijñānayojanyajanakabhāve manovijñānaṃ pratyakṣamiti uktaṃ bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:1298: tena janitamityādinetat kathayati- indriyavijñānena svaviṣayāntaraviṣayasahakāriṇopādānabhūtena yajjanitaṃ tadeva manovijñānaṃ pratyakṣam /
SA15dhnyabpu:1300: yadā cetyādinā dvayorekaṃ viṣayaṃ gṛhītvā yaccoditaṃ pareṇa tat parihṛtam /
SA15dhnyabpu:1301: pūrvakṣaṇe indriyavijñānasya viṣayo dvitīyakṣaṇe manovijñānasya viṣaya ityagṛhītagrāhi manovijñānam /
SA15dhnyabpu:1302: yadā cityādinā yaccodayaṃ kṛtam- yadi manovijñānamindriyasavyapekṣam,
SA15dhnyabpu:1310: tena teṣāṃ na manovijñānaṃ bhavatīti parihṛtam /
SA15dhnyabpu:1315: anyathā pañca bāhyā vijñeyāḥ ityasya vyaghātaḥ syāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:1317: nopādeyakṣaṇa evaḥ tena vijñānaviṣayadeśe 'paraśbdo yadotpadyate tadā mānasaṃ pratykṣaṃ svaviṣayānantaraviṣayasahakāriṇā janitaṃ bhavatītyadoṣaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:1319: kutaḥ? indriyavijñānena samanantarapratyayena janitamityukterandhavadhirādayabhavayadā cidnriyavijñānaviṣayopādeyabhūtaḥ kṣaṇo gṛhītaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:1322: cyapāravati tu cakṣuṣi yad rūpajñānaṃ tat sarva cakṣuraśritamevaḥ itarathā cakṣurāśritatvānu papattiḥ kasyacidapi vijñānasya /
SA15dhnyabpu:1325: evañjātīyakaṃ tad yadi syāt na kaścid doṣaḥ syād- iti vaktuṃ lakṣaṇamākhyātamasyeti // 9 //
SA15dhnyabpu:1328: yadā cakṣuviṣayamālocyoparataṃ bhavati tadālocanāviṣaye cakṣurvijñānamutpannaṃ sat punadvitīye kṣaṇa ātmīyaviṣayānantaraviṣaye notpadayateḥ indriyāṇāṃ tatra vyāpārābhāvāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:1329: tataśca tenendriyavijñānena svaviṣayānantaraviṣayasahakāriṇā pratyakṣamutpadayate iti sthitam /
SA15dhnyabpu:1330: nanvekasmin kṣaṇe tasyotpadake sati na tatra kācidarthakriyāvāpyate- iti puruṣārthānupayogitvāt prāmāṇyaṃ prāpnoti?
SA15dhnyabpu:1333: te ca tasmin kṣaṇe mānase copadarśitaṃ viṣayaṃ pratipadaya dharmadeśanādikamarthakriyāmāsādayantītyanavadayam /
SA15dhnyabpu:1338: nanu vyāpāravati cakṣuṣi prathame kṣaṇa indriyavijñānaṃ bhavati,
SA15dhnyabpu:1342: evaṃ manyate- vyāāravati cakṣuṣi kimitīndriyavijñānaṃ notpadayate,
SA15dhnyabpu:1345: nanu ca yadi mānasaṃ pratyakṣamindriyavijñānād bhitre pratyakṣādipramāṇasiddhaṃ bhavet,
SA15dhnyabpu:1346: tadā tasya lakṣaṇaṃ yāvatā pramāṇasiddhameva nāsti?
SA15dhnyabpu:1350: tadetad dharmottareṇāgamasiddhaṃ darśayatāmācāryajñānagarbhaprabhṛtīnāṃ mānasasiddhaye yat pramāṇamupanyastam vikalpodayāt iti,
SA15dhnyabpu:1365: sarve ca te cittcaittāśca sarvacitta vaktum- dvayoyugapadutpattirnāstītiḥ yataḥ samānendriyayornāsti,
SA15dhnyabpu:1369: na ca tatra bhedenānupalabhyamānaṃ mānasa nāstīti śakyate vaktumḥ samānajātīyanīlavikalpīdayāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:1374: yathā- devadattena nīle gṛhīte na yajñadattasya nīlaniścayo bhavati,
SA15dhnyabpu:1383: tenendriyavijñānādeva vijātīyād vikalpakasyotpattenaṃ dikalpasyodayāditi mānasasiddhau hetuḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:1394: na ca tatra mānasaṃ saṃviducyate indriyavijñānasya vyavahāreṇa,
SA15dhnyabpu:1395: prāmāṇyasya cintyatvāt kiñca indriyavijñānasya kathaṃ prāmānyam,
SA15dhnyabpu:1399: nanu cittacaitā iti vaktavye sarvagrahaṇasya vyāvartyābhāvādapārthakaṃ tadgrahaṇam?
SA15dhnyabpu:1402: sarve hi cittacaittāḥ pratītisvabhāvatvāt svarūpajñāpakā bhavanti /
SA15dhnyabpu:1403: yathā pradīpaḥ prakāśasvabhāvatvād ātmano 'pi prakāśako bhavati,
SA15dhnyabpu:1409: yena hi rūpeṇātmā vedayate tadrūpamātmasavedanaṃ pratyakṣam /
SA15dhnyabpu:1410: iha ca rūpādau vastuni dṛśyamāne āntaraḥ sukhādayākārastulyakālaṃ saṃvedayate /
SA15dhnyabpu:1411: na ca gṛhayamāṇākāro nīlādiḥ sātarūpo vedayate- iti vaktuṃ śakyamḥ yato nīlādiḥ sātarūpeṇānubhūyate iti ca niścīyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:1412: yadi hi sātarūpo 'yaṃ nīlādiranubhūyate iti niścīyeta,
SA15dhnyabpu:1414: yasmin rūpe pratyakṣasya sākṣātkāritvavyāpāro vikalpenānugamyate tat pratykṣam /
SA15dhnyabpu:1416: na kevalaṃ prasiddhāḥ sukhaḥ dayaścittarcattāḥ svasaṃvedanā gṛhyanteḥ anye 'pi svasaṃvedanā iti tātparyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:1419: evaṃ brubatā ṭīkākṛtānena nirodhasamāpattyasthāyāṃ śuddhacittābhāva evetyabhiprāyaḥ pradarśitaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:1420: tasyāmavasthāyāṃ na kācit cittāvasthā saṃvedayate yataḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:1426: evaṃ manyate- yathā pradīpaḥ prakāśatayā svarūpaṃ nivedayannātmaprakāśane na pradīpāntamapekṣate,
SA15dhnyabpu:1427: tathā cittādikamapi saṃvidrūpatayā svarūpaṃ nivedayadātmasaṃvedane na jñānāntaramapekṣate /
SA15dhnyabpu:1431: tatrāpi nīlākārotpattireva prakāśakatvaṃ jñānasya pradīpasyāpi prāgbhāvitvameva /
SA15dhnyabpu:1434: tataśca vijñānaṃ bodharūpatayā pratyakṣeṇānubhūyamānaṃ kathamapahnuyate bhavatā parokṣaṃ vijñānamiti /
SA15dhnyabpu:1435: evaṃ tāvat mausāṃsakādīn prati vijñānaṃ saṃvedanapratyakṣanirdiṣṭam /
SA15dhnyabpu:1436: yastu sāṃkhyo 'pi bāhyārūpāḥ sukhādayaḥ iti manyate,
SA15dhnyabpu:1439: tathā cittacaitā api svarūpāvabodhe jñānāntaraṃ nāpekṣante /
SA15dhnyabpu:1445: bhāvanā iti na ca nīlasya sātarūpatvamanugamyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:1461: evaṃ manyate- nīlarūpāt sātādikamantaraṃ saṃvedanaṃ pratyakṣeṇānubhūyamānaṃ na bāhayenābhinnarūpaṃ jaḍarūpaṃ ca śakyate vktumiti /
SA15dhnyabpu:1462: amumvārtha na ca gṛhyamāṇākāra ityādinā darśayati /
SA15dhnyabpu:1468: tena nīlādiḥ sātasvabhāvo na pratyakṣasiddhaḥ iti sāṅkhayaṃ nirākurvatā grāhyāgrāhakaṃ sātādirūpaṃ bhinnaṃ pratyakṣaṃ pradarśitam /
SA15dhnyabpu:1469: tena yuktamuktaṃ kaiścit- grāhayād bhinnaṃ grāhakaṃ na pratyakṣeṇānubhūyate iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:1481: tataśca kṣaṇikatvādigrāhi manovijñānaṃ bhāvyamānamīṣadasampūrṇamantakṣaṇaḥ prakarṣaparyanta ucyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:1491: tathā hi samādhivalaprabhavaṃ bhūta-bhāvi-vartamānānāṃ yathāyartha prakāśakaṃ jyotiḥ avibhramamāvirbhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:1492: yathā devādyaṣṭhānaprabhāveṇa satyāni svapnajñānāni bhūta-bhāvi- sampūrṇa tu yadā,
SA15dhnyabpu:1494: tataḥ sampūrṇāvasthāyāḥ prāktanī avasthā sphuṭābhatvaprakarṣaparyanta ucyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:1495: tasmāt paryantāt yajjātaṃ bhāvyamānasyāthasya sannihitasyeva sphuṭatarākāragrāhi jñānaṃ yoginaḥ pratyakṣam /
SA15dhnyabpu:1497: abhrakavyavahitamiva yadā bhāvyāmānaṃ vastu paśyati sā prakarṣaparyantāvasthā /
SA15dhnyabpu:1498: karatalāmalakavat bhāvyamānasyārthasya yad darśana tad yoginaḥ pratyakṣam /
SA15dhnyabpu:1501: tadiha sphuṭābhatvārambhetyādinā upasaṃhāracyajena yogino manovijñānasyāvasthātrayaṃ darśayati- bhāvanāprakarṣāvasthaikā,
SA15dhnyabpu:1506: iti nyāyād yadayapi manovijñānena bhāvanāprakarṣaparyantena śabdārtho yugapada gṛhyate tathāpi dvayoḥ svarūpasya sannihitatayā gṛhyamāṇatvāt tadgrāhi vijñānaṃ nirvikalpakamiti /
SA15dhnyabpu:1507: nanu ca manovijñānaṃ bhāvyamānaṃ vācyavācakasaṃsṛṣṭaṃ pratibhāsate yathā,
SA15dhnyabpu:1508: tathaiva bhāvyamānaṃ prakarṣaparyantarja manovijñānaṃ vācyavācakapratirbhāsi sphuṭābhaṃ bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:1511: eva manyate- aydyapi manovijñānaṃ vācya vācakasaṃsṛṣṭipratibhāsi,
SA15dhnyabpu:1521: tathaiva yogabalena dhyeyānāṃ jñānamatītānāgata dūra sāntara aṇubhūtaviṣayāṇā prakāśakaṃ jyotīrūpamutpadyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:1523: atra prayogaḥ- yogīśvarāṇāmekāgracittānāṃ jñānaṃ bhūta bhāvi vastuviṣayakaṃ pramāṇam ameyabhūta bhāvivastujātasya abhrāntopadarśanahetutvād,
SA15dhnyabpu:1527: aprāpakasyāpi ameya bhūta bhāvivastujātasya abhrāntopadarśanahetave 'yogyamapakārakamapi pramāṇaṃ ṣyāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:1528: dambhamātreṇāmeyasya padārthasya abhrāntopadarśanaṃ hi na sambhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:1529: tasya vyākhyānam- yathā grahaviśeṣāveśe bhūta bhāvivastusamūhānuśāsanam,
SA15dhnyabpu:1532: yathā vā bhagavata śākyamunerupadeśe bhāvideśanimitta satyopalabdhi mātṛceṭa kālakṣaya rājāśokādi āśāvana kaśmīrādeśāgamā aviparītā upalabhyante // 11 //
SA15dhnyabpu:1534: vikalpavijñānaṃ hi saṃketakāladṛṣṭatvena vastu gṛhṇat śabdasaṃsargayogyaṃ gṛhṇīyāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:1536: yathā ca pūrvotpannaṃ vinaṣṭaṃ jñānaṃ samprati asat,
SA15dhnyabpu:1554: viṣayiṇo jñānasyābhāve viṣayasyāpyarthasya saṃketakālabhāvi no 'bhāva ityasannihitaṃ saṃketakālabhāvi tad vastvāropya gṛhṇad vikalpavijñānamasphuṭaṃ bhavatīti /
SA15dhnyabpu:1555: sphuṭatvaṃ tato nivṛttaṃ nirvikalpe 'vattiṣṭhate iti vyāptiḥ sidhyati /
SA15dhnyabpu:1556: tataḥ sphuṭatvānnirvikalpakaṃ yogijñānamabhrāntaṃ ca pramāṇena śuddhārthagrāhitvāt saṃvādakam /
SA15dhnyabpu:1561: pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ yaduktam- tasya viṣayaḥ svalakṣaṇameva iti draṣṭavyam,
SA15dhnyabpu:1564: tadevaṃ pratyakṣasya kalpanāpoḍhatvābhrāntatvayuktasya prakārabhedaṃ pratipādaya viṣayavipratipatti nirākatukāma āha- tasyetyādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:1565: tasya catuvidhasya pratyakṣasya viṣayo boddhavyaḥ svalakṣaṇam /
SA15dhnyabpu:1567: vastuno hyasādhāraṇaṃ ca tattvamasti sāmānyaṃ ca /
SA15dhnyabpu:1569: dvividho hi viṣayaḥ pramāṇasya- grāhyaśca yadākāramutpadyate,
SA15dhnyabpu:1583: iha kaiścinmīmāṃsakābidhiḥ pratyakṣasya sāmānyaviśeṣo dvāvapi viṣayakalpitau /
SA15dhnyabpu:1585: sāṅkhayena dvayorapi viśeṣo viṣaya iṣṭaḥ sāmānyasyābhāvāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:1587: ātmārdvatatayā sarvasyaikatvāda viśeṣe bhrāntatvāda dvayoriti vipratipattiḥ pratyakṣādiviṣaye /
SA15dhnyabpu:1594: etad darśayati asādharaṇameva tattvaṃ vastuno rūpam /
SA15dhnyabpu:1595: sādhāraṇaṃ tu tattvamāropitaṃ rūpam pūrvāparakṣaṇā nāmabhedāvyavasāyāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:1598: tatrā sādhāraṇatattvaṃ pratyakṣasya grāhaviṣaya iti darśayati- yadasādhāraṇamityādinā /
SA15dhnyabpu:1603: yaṃ santānarūpeṇa sthitamartha tat pṛṣṭha bhāvina vikalpena vinścinoti /
SA15dhnyabpu:1604: nanu ca kathaṃ pratyakṣasya santāno viṣayaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:1607: pratyakṣavyāpāreṇa vikalpenādhyavaseyatayā viṣayīkṛtatvāt pratyakṣaviṣaya ityucyate upacārādityadoṣaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:1618: asannidhāne sa punarāropito 'rtho gṛhyamāṇaḥ svalakṣaṇetvenāvasīyate yataḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:1621: tadatra pramāṇasya grāhya viṣayaṃ darśayatā pratyakṣasya svalakṣaṇaṃ viṣaya uktaḥ // 12 //
SA15dhnyabpu:1622: kaḥ punarasau viṣayo jñānasya yaḥ svalakṣaṇaṃ pratipattavyaḥ?
SA15dhnyabpu:1628: tasmāt sannidhānādasannidhānācca jñānapratibhāsasya grāhyakārasya bhedaḥ sphuṭatvāsphuṭatvābhyām /
SA15dhnyabpu:1636: evaṃ manyate- nanu pratyakṣasya svalakṣaṇaṃ viṣayaḥ ityukte sāmānyamapi tasya viṣaya iti tadap svalakṣaṇaṃ prāpnotīti praśnaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:1637: asannidhānaṃ dūradeśāvasthānamiti bruvatā vinītadeva sya vyākhyā dūṣitā /

SA15dhnyabpu:3923: svabhāvena pratibandho yastsminnasatyekasya sādhyasya nivṛttyā nāparasya sādhanasya niyamena yuktā niyamavatī nivṛttiḥ // 30 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3924: sa ca svabhāvapratibandho dviprakāraḥ sarvasya pratibaddhasya /
SA15dhnyabpu:3925: tādātmyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ nimittaṃ yasya sa tathoktaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:3927: yo yatra pratibaddhastasya sa pratibandhaviṣayo 'rthaḥ svabhāvaḥ kāraṇaṃ vāsyat anyasmin prasiddhatvānupapatteḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:3930: 32 tena hi nivṛtti kathayatā pratibandho darśanīyaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:3932_0: yacca pratibandhopadarśanaṃ tadevānvayavacanamiyekenāpi vākyena anvayamukhena vyatirekamukhena
SA15dhnyabpu:3932_1: vā prayuktena sapakṣāsapakṣayorliṅgasya sadasattvakhyāpanaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavatīti nāvaśyaṃ
SA15dhnyabpu:3937: tadutpattirlakṣaṇaṃ yasya sa tadutpattilakṣaṇa iti vigrahaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:3940: abhāve na tena hetunā kasyacidekasya nivṛtyā aparanivṛttiramidhīyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:3945: iti cedāha- yadeva pratibandhopadarśanaṃ tadevānvaya iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:3946: tasmādekenāpi vākyenānvayamukhena vyatirekamukena vā prayuktena sapakṣāsapakṣayorliṅgasya sadasattvakhyāpanaṃ kṛta bhavatīti /
SA15dhnyabpu:3950: tena sādhyasya nivṛttau sādhanasya nivṛtti kathayatā pratibandho nivarttya nivartakayordarśanīyaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:3951: yadi hi sādhanaṃ sādhye pratibaddham bhavet,
SA15dhnyabpu:3954: tasmāt sādhyanivṛtau yat sādhana nivṛttivacanaṃ tenākṣiptaṃ pratibandhopadarśanam /
SA15dhnyabpu:3958: yasmāt dṛṣṭānte pramāṇena pratibandho darśyamāna evānvayaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:3961: tathā ca anvaya eva jñāto bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:3964: tasmādekenāpi sapakṣe cāsapakṣe ca sattvāsattvayoḥ khyāpanaṃ kṛtam /
SA15dhnyabpu:3965: anvayo mukham= upāyo 'bhidheyatvād yasya tad anvayamukhaṃ vākyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:3969: tasmād ekasmin sādhanavākye dvayoranvaya vyatirekayoravaśyameva prayogau na na kartavyāḥ //
SA15dhnyabpu:3970: 33 anupalabdhāvapi yatsad upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ tadupalabhyata evetyukte 'nupalabhyamānaṃ tādṛśamasaditi pratīteranvayadisśiḥ //
SA15dhnyabpu:3972: prayogaḥ kriyate ced vyatirekamukhena karaṇamapi yuktameva,
SA15dhnyabpu:3973: tathāpi uktaprakāreṇa sapakṣāsapakṣayoḥ sattvāsattvayorabhidhānameva sattvāsattvapradarśanaṃ bhavatīti ubhayenāpi liṅgena pratyekaṃ kriyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:3975: tasmādekasminneva prayoge sādharmyavato vaidharmyavataśca vākyadvayasya prayogo nāvaśyaṃ kāryaḥ // 32 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3985: sādharmyavati vaidharmyavati cānumāne ubhayatrāi pakṣanirdeśo nāsti /
SA15dhnyabpu:3986: evaṃ ca pakṣānirdheśābhāva eva kalpyata iti cet?
SA15dhnyabpu:3988: avaśyameva pakṣo nidehsyaḥ iti yo niyamaḥ, sa tu nāsti // 34 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3998: yadi ca sādhanasambhave 'pi sādhyanivṛttirbhavet na sādhanābhāvena vyāptā bhavet /
SA15dhnyabpu:3999: ato vyāptiṃ pratipadyamānena sādhanasambhavaḥ sādhyasambhavena vyāptaḥ pratipattavyaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:4003: yataśca sādhanaṃ sādhyadharmapratibaddhaṃ tādātmya tadutpattibhyāṃ pratipattavyaṃ dvayorapi prayogayoḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:4005: yat sādhanaṃ sādhyaniyataṃ pratītaṃ tata eva sādhyadharmiṇi dṛṣṭāt sādhyapratītiḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:4008: nopalabhyate cātrāpi upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāpto ghaṭa iti sāmarthyādeva iha ghaṭo nāstīti bhavati //
SA15dhnyabpu:4009: 36 tathā vaidharmyavatprayoge 'pi yaḥ sadvayavahāraviṣaya upalabdhilaksāṇaprāptaḥ sa upalabhyata eva /
SA15dhnyabpu:4010: na tathātra tādṛśo ghaṭa upalabhyate ityukte sāmarthyādeva neha sadvayavahāraviṣaya iti bhavati //
SA15dhnyabpu:4011: upalabdhilakṣaṇarpāpto yāvānnopalabhyate sa sarvo 'sadvayavahāraviṣaya iti nikhilapadārthosaṃhāreṇa anvayaḥ kārya iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:4012: nikhilapadārthopasaṃhāreṇānvayo yatra ca pakṣadharmaḥ ityetayonirdeśa tacca sādhyaṃ tatra sāmarthyena siddhayatīti pakṣanirdeśasya kiṃ praojanam? // 35 //
SA15dhnyabpu:4013: nikhilapadārthopasaṃhāreṇa yo vyatirekanirdeśaḥ pakṣadharmaśceti tadubhayasāmarthyena pratijñāpratītenaṃ pratijñānirdeśaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:4015: yadā sāmarthyena pratijñārthapratītirjāyate tadā pratijñāvacanaśravaṇe uparodhenāpi ka āgrahī syāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:4020: sādharmyavati prayoge 'pi sāmarthyādeva neha pradeśe ghaṭaḥ iti bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:4022: ityāha- yadupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ sannopalabhyate iti anupalambhānuvādaḥ so 'sadvayavahāraviṣaya iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:4024: tathā ca sati dṛśyānupalambho 'sadvayavahārayogyatvena vyāpto darśitah /
SA15dhnyabpu:4025: nopalabhyate ca ityādinā sādhyadharmiṇi sattvaṃ liṅgasya darśitam /
SA15dhnyabpu:4026: yadi ca sādhyadharmastatra sādhyadharmiṇi na bhavet,
SA15dhnyabpu:4029: yathā sādharmyavatprayoge tathā vaidharmyavatprayoge 'pi neha sadvayavahāraviṣayo 'sti ghaṭa iti bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:4036: anena ca sādhyanivṛtiḥ sādhananivṛttyā vyāptā darśitā /
SA15dhnyabpu:4038: yathānyo dṛśya upalabhyate na tathātra pradeśe tādṛśa iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:4042: yadi ca sādhyadharmaḥ sādhyadharmiṇi na syāt sādhana
SA15dhnyabpu:4047: bhidhānārthe pakṣanirdeśe ca doṣaḥ ko 'pi nāsti /
SA15dhnyabpu:4049: yadi punaḥ sarvathā pakṣanirdeśapratiṣedha evābhirpetaḥ syāt,
SA15dhnyabpu:4051: yadi viniścayavacanābhidhāne ca pakṣanirdeśa iti ucyate,
SA15dhnyabpu:4056: tathā pratyakṣādinā ca na nirākriyate tādṛśo 'rthaḥ pakṣa iti abhidheyaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:4059: sādhyarūpeṇa vinā anyarūpeṇa na yujyate iti svarūpeṇoktameva sādhyatvenāvagantavyamiti // 39 //
SA15dhnyabpu:4064: ataḥ sāmarthyāt nāstyatra ghaṭa iti pratītena pakṣanirdeśaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:4065: evaṃ kārya svabhāvahetvorapi samarthyāt sampratyaya iti na pakṣanirdeśaḥ // 36 //
SA15dhnyabpu:4073: evambhūtaḥ san pratyakṣādibhiḥ anirākṛto yo 'rthaḥ sa pakṣa ityucyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:4088: śabde 'siddhatvāt sādhyaṃ bhavatīti na puanratra sādhyatvenaiveṣṭam,
SA15dhnyabpu:4094: yaḥ śabdaḥ so 'nityaḥ ityucyamāne tacca cākṣuṣatvaṃ śabde 'siddhamiti sādhyaṃ bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:4097: kasmānna pakṣa iti ced? āha- atreti /
SA15dhnyabpu:4102: sādhanaṃ kathayatā svayaṃ nirdeśyo yo 'rthaḥ sa eva pakṣaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:4107: padāntarābhihitasyarthasya viśeṣa dayotayati- iti padāntareṇa viśeṣyavācinā saha nirdiṣṭaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:4113: śabdayānityatve sādhye cākṣuṣatvaṃ hetuḥ śabde 'siddhatvāt sādhyam ityanena sādhyatveneṣṭimāha /
SA15dhnyabpu:4122: svayamityanena svayaṃ śabdaṃ vyākhyeyamupakṣipya tasyārthamāha- svayamiti /
SA15dhnyabpu:4123: svayaṃśabdo nipātaḥ ātmanaḥ iti ṣaṣṭhayantasya ātmanā iti ca tṛtīyāntasyārthe vartate /
SA15dhnyabpu:4127: tato yasya vādina ātmā tṛtīyārtha yuktaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:4129: na tu svayaṃśabdasya vādinā ityeṣa paryāyaḥ // 42 //
SA15dhnyabpu:4133: 44 etena yadayapi kvacit śāstre sthitaḥ sādhanamaha,
SA15dhnyabpu:4134: taccāstrakāreṇa tasmin dharmiṇyanekadharmābhyupagame 'pīti yastadā tena vādinā dharmaḥ svayaṃ sādhayitumiṣṭaḥ sa eva sādhyo netara ityuktaṃ bhavati //
SA15dhnyabpu:4135: 45 iṣṭa iti yatrārthe vivādena sādhanamupanyastaṃ tasya siddhimiccatā so 'nukto pi vacanena sādhyo bhavati //
SA15dhnyabpu:4136: teneti vādinā nirdeśya eva pakṣa ucyate // 43 //
SA15dhnyabpu:4137: kaścit kvacit śāstre sthitaḥ pakṣe kṛtaniścaya eva /
SA15dhnyabpu:4139: tathāpi yadi śāstrāduddhṛtya pramāṇikriyate iti śeṣaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:4140: vādī yasmin śāstre sādhanaṃ kathayati taccāstrakāreṇa vitarkaviṣayadharmiṇi yadi bahavo dharmā aṅgīkriyante, tathāpi ca /
SA15dhnyabpu:4141: vādinaiva yo dharma sādhayitumiṣṭaḥ sa eva sādhyaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:4142: śāstrakāreroṣṭastu na yasmād vādinā nirdeśyasya pakṣatvamaṅgīkriyate tasmād vādinā śāstrāṅgīkāradvāreṇopakārako yo dharmaḥ pariṣkartumiṣyate sa eva sādhyaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:4148: anena tadā vādakāle tena vādinā svayaṃ yo dharmaḥ sādhayitumiṣṭaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:4155: yaccāstraṃ tena vādinābhyupagataṃ taccāstrakāreṇa tasmin sādhyadharmiṇi anekasya dharmasyābhyupagame sati anyadharmasādhyatvasambhavaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:4156: tathā hi- śāstraṃ yenābhyupagataṃ tatsiddho dharmaḥ sarva eva tena sādhya ityasti vipratipattiḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:4158: anekadharmābhyupagame 'pi sati sa eva sādhyo yo vādinā iṣṭaḥ, nānya iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:4161: satyamḥ āhopuruṣikayā tu yadayapi kvaciccāstre sthita iti kiñciccāstramabhyupagataḥ sādhanamāha,
SA15dhnyabpu:4162: tathāpi ya eva tasyeṣṭaḥ sa eva sādhyaḥ iti jñāpanāyedamuktam // 44 //
SA15dhnyabpu:4167: atra ātmārthā ityanukte 'pi ātmārthataiva sādhyaṃ bhavatīti /
SA15dhnyabpu:4171: vivādādhikaraṇaṃ tad vastu sādhayitumiccatā sādhyatvenopanyasto 'rtha eveṣṭa iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:4176: tata eva yasmād vivādaḥ kathamasau vivāda eva sādhyo na syāt // 46 //
SA15dhnyabpu:4177: yacca vivādādhikaraṇaṃ tad vacanenānuktamapi sādhyameveṣyata iti katham iti ced?
SA15dhnyabpu:4179: vādaḥ prakrāntaḥ- nāsti ātmā ityātmapratiṣedhavādaḥ ātmasattāvādaviruddhaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:4182: tasyātmārthasya siddhi niścayam iccatā vādinā so 'rthaḥ sādhya ityuktaṃ bhavati- iṣṭaśabdena /
SA15dhnyabpu:4183: yat tad ityukta bhavati iti grahaṇamante tadihāpekṣya vākyaṃ samāpayitavyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:4184: yadyapi parārthānumāne ukta eva sādhyo yuktaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:4188: so 'rthaḥ adhikaraṇam= āśrayo yasya sa tadadhikaraṇo vivādaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:4190: etaduktaṃ bhavati- yasmād vivādaṃ nirākartumiccatā vādinā sādhanamupanyastam,
SA15dhnyabpu:4191: tasmād yad adhikaraṇaṃ vivādasya tadeva sādhyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:4192: yato viruddhaṃ vādamapanetuṃ sādhanamukpanyastaṃ taccet na sādhyam,
SA15dhnyabpu:4196: cakṣurādiryeṣāṃ śrotrādīnāṃ te cakṣurādaya iti dharmī /
SA15dhnyabpu:4200: śayanam āsanaṃ ca te ādau yasya taccayanāsanādi puruṣopabhogāṅgaṃ saṅghātarūpam /
SA15dhnyabpu:4205: 49 tatra pratyakṣanirākṛto yathā- aśrāvaṇaḥ śabdaḥ iti //
SA15dhnyabpu:4207: tathā cakṣurādayo 'pi saṅghātarūpatvāt parārthā eveti prayogārthaḥ // 47 //
SA15dhnyabpu:4208: asmin prayoge yadayapi cakṣurādaya ātmārthā iti noktam,
SA15dhnyabpu:4220: tataḥ sāṅkhayena svavādaviruddhaṃ bauddhavādaṃ hetūkṛtya viruddhavādanirākaraṇāya svavādapratiṣṭhāpanāya ca sādhanamupanyastam /
SA15dhnyabpu:4223: śayanāsanādiṣu hi puruṣopabhogāṅgeṣu ātmārthatvenāvvayo na prasiddhaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:4229: parasyārthakāri vijñānaṃ setsyatīti sāmarthyāt ātmārthatvaṃ sidhyati cakṣurādīnām- iti matvā parārthagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam /
SA15dhnyabpu:4231: api tu prativādino vivādāspadatvād vādinaḥ sādhayitumiṣṭam uktamanuktaṃ vā prakaraṇagamyaṃ sādhyam- ityuktaṃ bhavati // 47 //
SA15dhnyabpu:4236: etallakṣaṇena yoge 'pyartho na pakṣa iti pradarśanārtham pratipādanāya anirākṛtagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam /
SA15dhnyabpu:4238: ityāha- yaḥ sādhayitumiṣṭo 'rthaḥ pratyakṣaṃ ca anumānaṃ ca pratīniśca svavacanaṃ ca- etairnirākriyate viparītaḥ sādhyate,
SA15dhnyabpu:4240: tatreti / teṣu caturṣu pratyakṣādinirākṛteṣu pratyakṣanirākṛtaḥ kīdṛśaḥ? yathiti /
SA15dhnyabpu:4245: tadā so 'rthaḥ pakṣo na bhavatīti pradarśanārthamanirākṛta ityuktam // 48 //
SA15dhnyabpu:4254: aśrāvaṇaḥ śabdaḥ iti partijñā tu pratyakṣeṇa nirākriyate/
SA15dhnyabpu:4255: tathā hi- karṇavijñānasya śabdaprakāśakatvaṃ prāṇībhiḥ sarvaiḥ svayamavagamyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:4256: tena śabde śrāvaṇatvasya svakīyajñānena pratīteraśrāvaṇatvaṃ nirākriyate // 49 //
SA15dhnyabpu:4257: atra- ghaṭasya nityatvaṃ pratijñātaṃ kṛtādyanumānena nirākriyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:4261: yadi kenacit śaśī na candraśabdabhidheyaḥ iti pratijñā kriyate,
SA15dhnyabpu:4262: sa tu śaśī candraśabdābhidheya eva iti prasiddhayā nirākriyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:4263: api ca sarveṣvartheṣu sarvasya śabdasya vācyatayāpi nirākriyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:4272: pratītyā nirākṛtaḥ acandra iti candraśabdavācyo na bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:4278: tena vikalpajñānena pratītirūpeṇa śaśinaścandraśabdavācyatvaṃ siddhameva / tathāhi-
SA15dhnyabpu:4280: yaccabdākārasaṃsargayogyaṃ tat sāṅketikena śabdena vaktuṃ śakyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:4285: tataḥ svabhāvahetusiddhaṃ candraśabdavācyatvam avācyatvasya bādhakaṃ draṣṭavyam // 51 //
SA15dhnyabpu:4287: kenacid anumānaṃ pramāṇaṃ na bhavati ityucyamāne tat svavacanena viruddham /
SA15dhnyabpu:4291: anumānaṃ ca yadi pramāṇaṃ na syāt vākyaṃ tāvat kutaḥ pramāṇam /
SA15dhnyabpu:4298: sa nānumānaṃ pramāṇam ityanena svavācakena vākyena bādhyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:4299: vākyaṃ hi etat prayujyamānaṃ vaktuḥ śābdapratyayasya sadarthatvamiṣṭaṃ sūcayati /
SA15dhnyabpu:4300: tathā hi- madvākyād yo 'rthasampratyayastavotpadyate so 'satyārthaḥ iti darśayan vākyameva noccārayed vaktā,
SA15dhnyabpu:4303: yo 'pi hi sarva mithyā bravīmi iti vakti,
SA15dhnyabpu:4310: tasmād vākyaprabhavavākyārthālambanaṃ vijñānaṃ satyārtha darśayannev vaktā vākyamuccārayati /
SA15dhnyabpu:4311: tathā ca sati vāhyavastunāntarīyakaṃ śabdaṃ darśayatā śabdajaṃ vijñānaṃ satyārtha darśayitavyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:4312: tato bāhyārthakāryāccabdādutpannaṃ vijñānaṃ satyārthamādarśayatā kāryaliṅgajamanumānaṃ pramāṇaṃ śābdaṃ darśitaṃ bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:4313: tasmāt nānumānaṃ pramāṇam iti bruvatā śābdasya pratyayasyāsatrārtho grāhya uktaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:4318: tadevaṃ svavacnānumitena sattvenāsattvaṃ bādhyamānaṃ svavacanena bādhitamuktamityayamatrārthaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:4330: tenaiva svarūpeṇa vādina iṣṭo 'nirākṛtaḥ pakṣa iti pakṣalakṣaṇamana vadayaṃ darśitaṃ bhavati //
SA15dhnyabpu:4331: atrāgamaviruddha svavacanaviruddhe 'ntabhūta iti sarve pakṣābhāsāścatvāra ityuktam /
SA15dhnyabpu:4340: nirākṛtamātrasya ca viparītaṃ pakṣatvena draṣṭavyamityayamartha ukto bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:4344: abhiprākāryatvaṃ ca vāstavameva śabdasya tatastadiha na gṛhyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:4350: api ca, na svābhiprāyanivedanāya śabda uccāryate,
SA15dhnyabpu:4354: evaṃ ca sati anirākṛtagrahaṇena anantaroktāścatvāraḥ pakṣavadavabhāsanta iti pakṣābhāsā nirastā bhavanti // 53 //
SA15dhnyabpu:4355: samprati pakṣalakṣaṇapadāni yeṣāṃ vyavaccedakāni teṣāṃ vyavaccedena yādṛśaḥ pakṣārtho labhyate,
SA15dhnyabpu:4356: taṃ darśayituṃ vyavaccedayāna saṃkṣipya darśayati- evamiti /
SA15dhnyabpu:4358: siddhasya viparyayeṇa viparītvena hetunā sādhyo draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:4359: yasmādarthāt siddho 'rtho viparītaḥ sa sādhya ityarthaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:4384: trayāṇāṃ rūpāṇāṃ yogyamekamapi yadayuktamai vādiprativādinorasiddhaṃ sandigdhaṃ vā syat,
SA15dhnyabpu:4387: yaścāyaṃ pañcabhirvyavccedayai rahito 'rthosiddho 'sādhanaṃ vādinaḥ svayaṃ sādhayitumiṣṭa ukto 'nukto vā pramāṇairanirākṛtaḥ sādhyaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:4388: sa evāso svarūpeṇaiva svayamiṣṭo 'nirākṛta etaiḥ padairukta ityarthaḥ /

SA15dhnyabpu:5739: apradarśitānvayaśca yasmin dṛṣṭānte vidyamāno 'pyanvayo na pradarśito vaktrā,
SA15dhnyabpu:5747: anvayo viparīto yasmin dṛṣṭānte iti vigrahaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:5749: iha yat kṛtakaṃ tadanityam iryāmadheye yadanityaṃ tatkṛtakam iti viparītābhidhānam // 127 //
SA15dhnyabpu:5765: tasmād yat kṛtakaṃ tadani tyam iti kṛtakatvamanityatve niyatamabhidhāya niyamasadhanāyānvayavākyārthapratipattiviṣayo dṛṣṭānta upādeyaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:5769: na ca sādharmyāt sādhyasiddhirato 'nvayārtho dṛṣṭāntastadarthaścānena nopāttaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:5772: tato yadi nāma na duṣṭāṃ vastu,
SA15dhnyabpu:5774: tathā viparīto 'nvayo yasmin dṛṣṭānte sa tathoktaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:5782: tathāhi- yadanityamityanityatvamanūdaya tat kṛtakamiti kṛtakatvaṃ vihitam /
SA15dhnyabpu:5802: te ca yatra santi te sādhyādyavaytirekiṇah /
SA15dhnyabpu:5816: nityatve śabdasya sādhye hetāvamūrtatve paramāṇuvaidharmye dṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhyāvyatirekī nityatvāt paramāṇūnām karma sādhanāvyatireki /
SA15dhnyabpu:5833: āptatā ca tayorliṅgabhūtaḥ pramāṇatiśayo liṅgātmakaḥ pramāṇaviśeṣo 'vidayamānaḥ sarvajñatāptatāliṅgabhūtaḥ pramāṇātiśayo yasmin tathoktaṃ śāsanam /
SA15dhnyabpu:5834: tādṛśaṃ śāsanaṃ teṣāṃ te tathoktāḥ teṣāṃ bhāvastattvam /
SA15dhnyabpu:5837: atra vaidharmyodaharaṇam- yaḥ sarvajña āpto vā sa jyotirjñānādikamupadiṣṭavān /
SA15dhnyabpu:5840: 131 sandigdhasādhanavyatireko yathā- na trayīvidā rāmhaṇena grāhyavacanaḥ kaścid vivakṣitaḥ puruṣo rāgādimattvaditi /
SA15dhnyabpu:5849: tasmāt te sarvajñā vītarāgā veti niścetuṃ śakyata iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:5855: hi kapilādayaḥ sarvajñā āptā vā syuḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:5860: vaidharmyodāharaṇam- yaḥ sarvajña āpto vā sa jyotirjñānādikaṃ sarvajñatāptataliṅgabhūtamupadiṣṭāvān /
SA15dhnyabpu:5861: yathā ṛṣabho vardhamānaśca tāvādī yasya sa ṛṣabhvardhamānādirdigambarāṇāṃ śāstā sarvajñaśca āptaśceti /
SA15dhnyabpu:5862: tadiha vaidharmyodāharaṇam ṛṣabhāderasarvajñatvasyanāptatayāśca vyatireko vyāvṛttiḥ sandigdhā /
SA15dhnyabpu:5871: tena na grāhyaṃ vacanaṃ yasyeti sādhyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:5875: atra pramāṇe vaidharmyodāharaṇam- sādhyābhāvaḥ sādhanābhāvena yatra vyāpto darśyate tad vaidharyodaharaṇam /
SA15dhnyabpu:5876: grāhyaṃ vacanaṃ yeṣāṃ te grāhyavacanā iti sādhyanivṛttimanūdaya na te rāgādimanta iti sādhanābhavo vihitaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:5877: gauramaraṇam- ye grāhyavacanā na te rāgādimantaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:5882: atra vaidharmyeṇodāharaṇam- yo vītarāgo na tasya parigrahāgrahaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:5891: tenatadukta bhavati- trayīvid yo brāmhaṇastadabhimatapuruṣavacanaṃ nityapramāṇaṃ nāstīti /
SA15dhnyabpu:5894: ye hi grāhyavacanā na te rāgādimantaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:5896: gautama vyāsamuniprabhṛttibhiryāni dharmaśāstrāṇi praṇītāniv tāni hi trayīvidāṃ prāmāṇyavacanāni /
SA15dhnyabpu:5904: ādiryeṣāṃ te tathoktā manbādayo dharmaśāstrāṇi= smṛtayasteṣāṃ kartāraḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:5905: trayīvidā hi brāmhaṇena grāhyavacanā dharmaśāstrakṛto vītarāgāśca ta ītīha dharmī vyatirekaviṣayo gautamādaya iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:5916: svīkārādūrdhva yad gārdhya mātsarya sa āgrahaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:5917: parigrahaśca āgrahaśca tabhyāṃ yogāt kapilādayo labhyamānaṃ svīkurvanti svīkṛtaṃ na muñcanti- iti te rāgādimanto gamyante /
SA15dhnyabpu:5918: atra pramāṇe vaidharmyodāharaṇam- yatra sāhdyābhāva sādhanābhavo darśayitavyaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:5920: sādhyābhāvamanūdaya na tasya parigrahāgrahāviti sādhanābhavo vihitaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:5922: etasmād ṛṣabhādedṛṣṭāntād avītarāgatvasya sādhyaparigrahāgrahayogasya ca sādhanasya nivṛttiḥ sandigdhā /
SA15dhnyabpu:5925: vaidharmyeṇodāharaṇam- yatrāvītarāgatvaṃ nāsti, na sa vaktā /
SA15dhnyabpu:5927: yadayapyupalakhaṇḍādubhayaṃ vyāvṛtaṃ tathāpi sarvo vītarāgo na vakteti vyāptyā vyatirekāsiddheravyatirekaḥ //
SA15dhnyabpu:5930: ṛṣabhādayo hi svalpamatramapi vyañjanaṃ na parigṛhṇanti /
SA15dhnyabpu:5937: te ca sarve mānasattvāt indriyagocarā na bhavanti /
SA15dhnyabpu:5938: tasmāt ṛṣabhādibhyo vyāvṛttireveti niścetuṃ na śakyate // 132 //
SA15dhnyabpu:5946: tathāpi sarvo vītarāgo na vakteti vyāptirasiddhā /
SA15dhnyabpu:5952: yadi nāma tatsiddhānte vītarāgāśca niṣparigrahāśca paṭhayante,
SA15dhnyabpu:5954: aparānapi trīnudāhartumāha- avyatireka it avidyamāno vyatireko yasmin so 'vyatirekaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:5965: yadyapi upalakhaṇḍādubhayaṃ vyavṛttam- sarāgatvaṃ vītarāgatvaṃ ca tathāpi vyaptyā vyatireko yastasyasiddheḥ kāraṇādavyatireko 'yam /
SA15dhnyabpu:5980: tathāhi yadi ye ye ca apdārthā nityāḥ te sarva evākṛtakāḥ ityucyate,
SA15dhnyabpu:5989: sa śuddho 'pi svato yadi pareṇāśuddhaḥ khyāpyate sa tāvad yathā prakāśitastathā na yuktaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:5992: ato vakturaparādhādapi parāthānumāne heturdṛṣṭānto vā duṣṭāḥ syādapi /
SA15dhnyabpu:6003: vyatirekaviṣayatvena sa sādhakaḥ na ca tathopanyasta iti ayamapradarśitavyatireko vakturaparādhād duṣṭāḥ // 134 //
SA15dhnyabpu:6004: viparīto vyatireko yasmin vaidharmyadṛṣṭānte sa tathoktaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:6008: tadā vyatirekavākye sādhyābhāvaḥ sādhanābhāve niyato darśayitavyaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:6009: evaṃ hi hetuḥ sādhyaniyato darśitaḥ syāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:6010: yadi tu sādhyābhāvaḥ sādhanābhāve niyato nākhyāyate,
SA15dhnyabpu:6012: tathā ca sādhanaṃ sādhyaniyataṃ na pratīyeta /
SA15dhnyabpu:6014: viparītavyatireke ca sādhyābhāvaḥ sādhyābhāve niyata ucyate,
SA15dhnyabpu:6020: tathā ca sati akṛtakatvaṃ nityatve sādhyābhāve niyatamuktam,
SA15dhnyabpu:6023: 136 na hyebhirdṛṣṭāntābhāsairhetoḥ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ sapakṣa eva sattvaṃ vipakṣe ca sarvatrāsattvameva niścayena śakyaṃ darśayituṃ viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ vā /
SA15dhnyabpu:6029: taiśca dṛṣṭāntābhāsairhetoyacca sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ tadapi viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ tacca na śakyate darśayitum /
SA15dhnyabpu:6030: tata eva te dṛṣṭāntābhāsā iti dṛṣṭāntābhāsāḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:6031: yasmād dvividhamapi hetirlakṣaṇaṃ darśayituṃ na śakyate,
SA15dhnyabpu:6040: yena vacanena dosā uddhriyante tad dūṣaṇamiti /
SA15dhnyabpu:6045: ebhiśca hetoḥ sapakṣa eva sattvaṃ vipakṣe ca sarvatrāsattvameva yat sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ tat niścayena na śakyaṃ darśayitum /
SA15dhnyabpu:6062: 138 ye pūrva nyūnatādayaḥ sādhanadoṣā uktāsteṣāmudbhāvanaṃ dūṣaṇam tena pareṣṭārthasiddhipratibandhāt //
SA15dhnyabpu:6067: yasmāttena vacanena pūrvapakṣiṇā sādhayitumiṣṭasyārthasya siddhiḥ pratibadhyate,
SA15dhnyabpu:6075: yaiśca vacanaiḥ sādhanadoṣā abidhyamānā api udbhāvyante tāni jātayo veditavyāḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:6077: ucyate, dūṣaṇānāṃ tayā dūṣaṇābhāsānāṃ ca nirūpaṇe samyagjñānamapi sasahāyaṃ nirūpitaṃ bhavatoti /
SA15dhnyabpu:6078: tathā caitā hyatra dūṣaṇā iti tāsāṃ pariharo vidheyaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:6083: dūṣaṇaṃ vivarītumāha- ye pūrva nyūnatādayo 'siddhaviruddhānaikāntikā uktāḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:6087: ityāha- tena nyūnatādivacanena pareṣāmiṣṭaścāsāvarthaśca tasya siddhiḥ niścayaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:6090: api tu parasyābhipretaniścayavibandhānniścayābhāvo bhavati niścayaviparyaya ityastyeva viparyayasiddhiriti // 138 //
SA15dhnyabpu:6103: pṛthu yaccājitaṃ puṇyaṃ nyāyabidoḥ padaṃ padam /
SA15dhnyabpu:6120: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hayavadat /
SA15dhnyabpu:6121: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
